issue_type_descriptions.random_english_in_chinese: Random/spurious English characters mixed into Chinese text (likely OCR artifacts). Excludes legitimate terms like e化, K他命, X-ray, variable placeholders (X/Y/Z).
issue_type_descriptions.mojibake: Broken characters, garbled text, Private Use Area chars, or encoding issues (亂碼)
issue_type_descriptions.excessive_punctuation: Multiple consecutive identical punctuation marks (commas, periods, etc.)
issue_type_descriptions.incorrect_punctuation: Punctuation in wrong position (e.g., leading comma, period after open paren)
issue_type_descriptions.truncated_text: Text that appears cut off mid-sentence (unclosed brackets, trailing connectors)
issue_type_descriptions.circled_number: Circled numbers (①②③) found in text - common in exam notes, may need standardization
issue_type_descriptions.layout_artifact_座號: '座號' (seat number) found in text content
issue_type_descriptions.layout_artifact: Other exam page layout artifacts (page numbers, continuation instructions, etc.)
issue_type_descriptions.metadata_missing: Required metadata fields that are empty
issue_type_descriptions.metadata_garbage: Metadata fields containing garbage, mojibake, or invalid content
issue_type_descriptions.answer_送分: Answer marked as '送分' (free points/all correct) - informational
issue_type_descriptions.suspicious_answer: Answer field with unexpected format for choice questions
issue_type_descriptions.empty_field: Question stems or options that are empty
issue_type_descriptions.empty_file: Files with no questions at all
